{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Elton Trench|It|Elton Trench}} is an underwater trench located between [[Elynas]] and [[West Slopes of Mont Automnequi|Mont Automnequi]]. It is the final resting place of Fontaine's [[Sponsian|former Navy]], which sank in the battle against [[Elynas (NPC)|Elynas]].</p>}}

The trench is likely named after [[Basil Elton]], the Navy Admiral at the time of the battle.
